value.title: Food Delivery Robots Are Going Back To School This Fall
value.excerpt: Food delivery robots are becoming more popular with college students. Here are a few facts behind the robot invasion.

value.title: Zebra Concludes Fetch Robotics Acquisition
value.excerpt: Zebra Technologies announced Tuesday (Aug. 10) it has completed its acquisition of the cloud-driven autonomous mobile robot (AMR) startup Fetch Robotics.

value.title: Oracle Claims Leadership In Cloud Data Warehouse Space Over Snowflake With Its New MySQL Heatwave Service
value.excerpt: Senior Analyst, Servers, Matt Kimball, dives deeper as Oracle announced its next-generation MySQL HeatWave offering today, focusing on machine learning (ML)-based automation and scalability that the company claims will drive greater performance and price-performance leadership in the market.

value.title: OpenAI upgrades its natural language AI coder Codex and kicks off private beta
value.excerpt: OpenAI has already made some big changes to Codex, the AI-powered coding assistant the company announced last month. The system now accepts commands in plain English and outputs live, working code, letting someone build a game or web app without so much as naming a variable.

value.title: Artificial Intelligence and Robotics in Aerospace and Defense Market to See Revolutionary Growth | IBM, SITA, Nvidia Corporation
value.excerpt: MI published a new report titled Artificial Intelligence and Robotics in Aerospace and Defense Market The report offers an extensive analysis of key growth strategies drivers opportunities key segments Porter s Five Forces analysis and competitive landscape This

value.title: Machine learning discovers new sequences to boost drug delivery
value.excerpt: MIT researchers employ machine learning to find powerful peptides that can improve a gene therapy drug for Duchenne muscular dystrophy.

value.title: Salesforce’s Kathy Baxter is coming to TC Sessions: SaaS to talk AI
value.excerpt: As the use of AI has grown and developed over the last several years, companies like Salesforce have tried to tap into it to improve their software and help customers operate faster and more efficiently.

value.title: Twitter's AI bounty program reveals bias toward young, pretty white people
value.excerpt: Twitter's first AI bias bounty has wrapped up, and it learned that beauty filters skew its photo algorithm — among other issues..

value.title: Zzapp Malaria: The IBM Watson AI XPRIZE competition winner
value.excerpt: Tonya Hall talks to Seth Dobrin, chief AI officer at IBM, about how AI can help solve humanity's big challenges.

value.title: TetaVi Raises $20 Million For Its Metaverse-Focused Computer Vision Tech
value.excerpt: The startup hopes to democratize the ability for consumers to create for the metaverse through its cheaper and more flexible volumetric video software.

value.title: How artificial intelligence could find dementia with a single brain scan
value.excerpt: "If we intervene early, the treatments can kick in early and slow down the progression of the disease and at the same time avoid more damage," Prof Zoe Kourtzi of Cambridge University said.

value.title: Three Considerations To Keep In Mind Before Investing In AI
value.excerpt: There are some concrete steps you should take as a company leader to ensure you're investing in the AI solution that's right for your organization.

value.title: Artificial intelligence unlocks extreme weather mysteries
value.excerpt: From lake-draining drought in California to bridge-breaking floods in China, extreme weather is wreaking havoc. Preparing for weather extremes in a changing climate remains a challenge, however, because their causes are complex and their response to global warming is often not well understood.

value.title: AI For Population Health And Medical Imaging Gets A Boost With $230 Million Acquisitions
value.excerpt: Nanox announced today two acquisitions to create a globally connected, end-to-end AI in radiology and population health solution

value.title: This Startup Is Trailblazing Industrial AI Sphere
value.excerpt: DeTect Technologies is innovating and providing highly sophisticated and advanced yet easy-to-understand AI solutions

value.title: Embracing Complexity And Uncertainty: The STAGE Approach For AI-Powered Banking
value.excerpt: The Covid-19 pandemic introduced unprecedented uncertainty and pushed banks over the ascending triangle of digital transformation toward AI-powered banking.

value.title: Computer vision startup Zebra Medical Vision sells for $200M
value.excerpt: Zebra Medical Vision, a computer vision startup focused on health care, has agreed to be acquired in a deal worth $200 million.

value.title: Microsoft releases Fusion ransomware detection tool for Azure
value.excerpt: Microsoft has released a new ransomware detection feature for Azure that uses machine learning to spot potential attacks. 'Fusion Detection for Ransomware' will send an alert to customers when it observes actions that are "potentially associated with ransomware activities".

value.title: AI-Driven Biology Can Get Critical Medicines To Patients Faster
value.excerpt: Absci, a synthetic biology company that recently went public, is using an AI-powered platform for protein discovery and production to help pharmaceutical companies create drugs that were previously impossible to make.

value.title: SeaChange enables enhanced data analytics with AWS
value.excerpt: SeaChange will leverage AWS artificial intelligence and machine learning (ML) services to gain a deeper understanding of end-user engagement

value.title: Modeling Neural Networks on Real Brains Makes ANN Improvement
value.excerpt: A new study shows that artificial intelligence networks based on human brain connectivity can perform cognitive tasks efficiently.

value.title: 10 things in tech: AWS hiring spree — Musk's 2020 pay — AI for… pizza?
value.excerpt: AWS is on a hiring spree, Musk got $6.7 billion in compensation in 2020, and Pizza Hut wants to build a pizza AI: 10 things in tech you need to know.

value.title: Artificial intelligence could be used to diagnose dementia
value.excerpt: Researchers say AI tool could lead to earlier diagnoses that could improve patients’ outcomes

value.title: Logitech Scribe review: AI camera brings analogue whiteboards into video meetings
value.excerpt: Hybrid working and teaching, with a mixture of in-room and remote participants, is here to stay, and Logitech's Scribe provides a usable way of bringing analogue whiteboards into the digital fold. It's not inexpensive,

value.title: Artificial Intelligence and Robotics are the major investment trends that will define the decade
value.excerpt: The Continental Group, a leading insurance intermediary and financial services solutions provider in the GCC region, unveils findings about the major investment trends that will dominate the market in the coming decade.
